Name: Gare Sapphire Mechs
About the game: A polished top down action shooter set in a digital like world with upgradable mechs. Vitris-47 has been the central stage of many conflicts over the ages. The Idalin empire rules over the planet with an ironhand and war is always present. On the other side, thereÂ´s the resistance, trying to retake the planet to its former glory and you are part of it. Driving your mech around the gorgeous digital cityscapes of the planet, the time has come for a new power to arise and put an end to this war.
